snippet: The deficit of the federal agency that insures pensions for about 41 million Americans rose significantly in the latest fiscal year.
abstract: Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation reports its deficit was nearly $62 billion in fiscal 2014, up from $36 billion in 2013; firm insures pensions for about 41 million Americans.
lead_paragraph: The deficit of the federal agency that insures pensions for about 41 million Americans rose significantly in the latest fiscal year.

headline.main: Pension Insurer’s Deficit Rises to Nearly $62 Billion
headline.print_headline: Pension Insurer’s Deficit Rises to Nearly $62 Billion
